messages.title: You can't trust Boris Johnson's Tories.
messages.content: Only Labour can stop Boris Johnson and kick the Tories out of office.

messages.title: Labour stands for the real change Britain needs. Labour will:
messages.content:
1. Give over 700,000 people in Scotland a pay rise by introducing a Real Living Wage of £10 an hour
2. Increase funding for the NHS with more nurses and doctors to give patients the care they need
3. Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the climate emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs
4. Deliver £70 billion of additional funding to invest in Scotland's people, communities and public services
5. Tackle the housing crisis by capping private sector rents and building more council houses
6. Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say, and guaranteeing the option to Remain

Tackle the housing crisis by capping private sector rents and building more council houses
Get Brexit sorted by giving the people the final say, and guaranteeing the option to Remain
